CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 10, 1953, pg. 21 reads: "Ground-Breaking - Six clean new shovels turned the first earth for the 118 unit Belmar Gardens housing development. Participating are, left to right, Nicholas LeDonne, head  of the construction firm; Mrs. William Brafman; William Brafman, sponsor, Congressman Robert J. Corbett; Mayor David L. Lawrence, Councilman Patrick T. Fagan and Mrs. R.L. Vann.  At the extreme right is David Fuss, administrative assistant to Senator James M. Duff."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. William Brafman, Jessie Vann, and unknown woman, standing on site of Belmar Gardens for groundbreaking ceremony
